beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook: populateUsers

tests.title: should return an array of users
tests.fullTitle: USERS GET /users should return an array of users

tests.title: should create a new user
tests.fullTitle: USERS POST /users should create a new user

tests.title: should not create a new user with validation errors
tests.fullTitle: USERS POST /users should not create a new user with validation errors

tests.title: should return a single user
tests.fullTitle: USERS GET /users/:id should return a single user

tests.title: should not return a user with invalid ID
tests.fullTitle: USERS GET /users/:id should not return a user with invalid ID

tests.title: should update and return a single user
tests.fullTitle: USERS PATCH /users/:id should update and return a single user

tests.title: should not update and return a user with invalid ID
tests.fullTitle: USERS PATCH /users/:id should not update and return a user with invalid ID

tests.title: should not update and return a user with validation errors
tests.fullTitle: USERS PATCH /users/:id should not update and return a user with validation errors

tests.title: should delete and return a single user
tests.fullTitle: USERS DELETE /users/:id should delete and return a single user

tests.title: should not delete and return a user with invalid ID
tests.fullTitle: USERS DELETE /users/:id should not delete and return a user with invalid ID
